I will also set a price filter to ensure that only items under $190 are displayed. Additionally, I will check the specifications of each product to confirm they meet my requirements before clicking on them. This approach should help me find suitable options more efficiently.

3. **Review Results:** Carefully review the filtered results to identify products that meet all criteria (12", dual style, power amplifier, and under $190).

4. **Check Specifications:** Before clicking on any product, read the specifications and descriptions to ensure they match the requirements.

5. **Select and Purchase:** Click on the most suitable product, verify the details one last time, and proceed to purchase.

By following this structured approach, I can avoid the pitfalls of previous attempts and increase my chances of successfully finding the desired product.
